resources.string: When a sadistic serial killer begins murdering key political figures in Gotham, Batman is forced to investigate the city\'s hidden corruption and question his family\'s involvement.

string-array.name: movieDescriptionList
string-array.item: An F.B.I. Agent and an Interpol Detective track a team of illusionists who pull off bank heists during their performances, and reward their audiences with the money.

An alien scarab chooses Jaime Reyes to be its symbiotic host, bestowing the recent college graduate with a suit of armor that\'s capable of extraordinary powers forever changing his destiny as he becomes the superhero known as Blue Beetle.
